com.mapquest.android.maps
Class DrawableOverlay

java.lang.Object
  com.mapquest.android.maps.Overlay
      com.mapquest.android.maps.DrawableOverlay

public class DrawableOverlay
extends Overlay

An utility class to overlay a drawable resource.

Method Detail

draw

public void draw(android.graphics.Canvas canvas,
                 MapView mapView,
                 boolean shadow)
Description copied from class: Overlay
Draw this overlay on the given mapView, by default this method does nothing. There should be two calls to this method, one for shadow of the marker the other for the marker itself

Overrides:
draw in class Overlay
Parameters:
canvas - drawing canvas of the mapView
mapView - mapView where this request was started
shadow - draw the shadow or not on the current pass

setDrawable

                        BoundingBox bbox)
Sets the drawable object that must be overlaid and the bounding box associated with it.

bbox -

onTap

public boolean onTap(MapView mapView)
A callback method to notify of tap event on drawable. Override this method if tap event needs to be handled

Returns:
true if the tap event is handled

onTap

public boolean onTap(GeoPoint gp,
                     MapView mapView)
Overrides the Overlay.onTap(GeoPoint, MapView) to check for tap event. Calls Overlay.OverlayTapListener.onTap(GeoPoint, MapView) and onTap(MapView) if drawable's bounding box contains the geoPoint.

Overrides:
onTap in class Overlay
Returns:
returns false by default

onTouchEvent

public boolean onTouchEvent(android.view.MotionEvent evt,
                            MapView mapView)
Handles the touch event on the drawable and calls Overlay.OverlayTouchEventListener.onTouch(MotionEvent, MapView) if touch event triggered on drawable.

Overrides:
onTouchEvent in class Overlay
Returns:
returns false by default

destroy

public void destroy()
Clears up the drawable resources

Overrides:
destroy in class Overlay
